subject: What's your opinion?
body:
Looking for an effective and cheap solution to have sex like you had 10 years ago?
Click here to be the best lover in the world!
Viagra and Cialis will help you in any situation. 
Go to the site
And no one will know that you have some problems.
With best regards,
Waylon Green
 
 
Tolko obglodav krupnuiu kost dochista, prozhevav i zapiv drontumom iz Kuvshina, Verhovnyj mag udovletvorenno rygnul i soizvolil vernutsia k prervannomu Delu. Stranno, chto ty ne smog zazhech sigaretu, probormotal ia, chrezvychajno Nedovolnyj tem, chto Kengsh zametil, kak ia pri ego slovah chisto reflektorno Vzialsia pravoj rukoj za rukoiatku Klinka. No nichego, tebe eta vstriaska pojdet vo Blago, uteshil chuzhoj. . 
My nemnogo postoiali molcha, poddavshis obshchemu nastroeniiu. Kak by vas eta samouverennost ne sgubila, da tak bystro, Chto udivitsia ne uspeete. Kazalos, plechi ego upiraiutsia v Nebo. Dikoe, Zabroshennoe, no na svoj lad udivitelnoe mesto. Lovchij mag ne vozrazhal by Protiv boia v drugoe vremia, sejchas zhe emu ne hotelos raspyliat silu, Prednaznachennuiu demonu. Skan-set razvernulas sama, slovno istomivshijsia po ranee Privychnoj zhiznedeiatelnosti mozg staralsia naverstat upushchennoe. No sejchas prishlos Sdelat iskliuchenie. Ia povernulsia k nej spinoj i otpravilsia k trasseru, indifferentno dumaia O tom, chto ugadal o ee namereniiah otpravitsia za nami sledom. 
Mozg prevratilsia v terminal vizoseti, obychnyj vizor, bez Kotorogo ne mozhet obojtis ni odna semia na Nove-2, korotaia vremia po Vecheram. Dvigaj na Fermu. No on nes smert, a ne Prohladu, izluchaia besposhchadnyj bagrovyj svet, raskalennyj do zvezdnyh Temperatur. Chto zh, nado bylo togda samomu. ejisuminyon Q1FUW1pVckRcUFBGHUFCUEZWRlleXR1XVA==
